name: Cacthorne: Love Can Be A Prickle!
name_original: Cacthorne: Love Can Be A Prickle!
description:
Have you ever wondered what would it be like to date a cactus princess? Well, duh. Everyone has...right?

But wouldn't it be awesome if an actual dating sim where that happened were to be developed?

CACTHORNE is that game. As you uncover the story of our protagonist, you'll be introduced to the three sister princesses hailing from the distant and mysterious Desert Kingdom.

The sweet and lady-like Esmeralda.
The shy and adorable Ynez. And the flirtatious and sassy Juanita.

You'll have three days to get to know your prickly romantic interests and to forge a true bond with them, as you're immersed in a world of Mexican-inspired aesthetic and dreamy, thorny -- catch that? -- modern fantasy.

TEAM: ART:
  • Camille Martins (Character Design & Art Direction)
  • Domingos Frederico (Original Art Concepts)
  • Gustavo Gonçalves (GUI & Itch.io Layout)
  • Pedro Freitas (Backgrounds, GUI & Itch.io Layout)
CODE:
  • Gabriel Temporão (Dialogue Scripting)
  • João Gabriel Rodrigues (Coding)
GAME DESIGN & NARRATIVE:
  • Domingos Frederico (Original Idea & Game Design)
  • Gabriel Temporão (Narrative)
  • João Pedro Conceição (Original Idea)
PRODUCTION:
  • João Gabriel Rodrigues (Producer)
SOUND & MUSIC:
  • João Gabriel Rodrigues (Sound Design & Theme Song)
  • Royalty-Free Music from https://www.zapsplat.com
